meta.title: Services | Varena
meta.description: Explore Varena's services: single-offer landings, full business websites, and online stores designed with clarity, personal attention, and practical results.

hero.title: Three ways to work your online presence
hero.description: A landing, a full business website or an online store? Varena adapts to your current needs with a clear, professional and easy-to-use approach.

cards.title: Single-offer page (landing)
cards.text: One concise page for a flagship service, course or campaign with a single clear objective: help visitors understand your offer and know what to do next.
list: Typical structure: problem, solution, benefits, proof, FAQ and contact.
Perfect for driving traffic from ads, social media or email.
Includes WhatsApp button, contact form and social links.
Optimised design for fast loading on every device.
SEO-friendly set up so Google understands your offer.

cards.title: Business website
cards.text: Your main online space with multiple sections to show who you are, what you offer, how you work and how to book you.
list: Home plus key sections like About, Services, FAQ and Contact.
We help organise content and write clear copy.
Includes WhatsApp button, contact form and social links.
Responsive design that works on every screen size.
Structured so you can grow it later with more pages.

cards.title: Online store / e-commerce
cards.text: For businesses that want to show products and sell directly from their website with an organised catalog and smooth buying flow.
list: Product catalog with photos, descriptions and pricing.
Cart and checkout with payment and shipping options.
SEO-ready structure with clean URLs and clear titles.
Mobile-friendly design for comfortable shopping.
Quick training so you can manage products yourself.

common.title: What all projects have in common
common.description: Regardless of the project type, every Varena website shares focus on clarity, personal attention and usefulness.

cards.title: Connected to your channels
list: WhatsApp button so enquiries go straight to your preferred number.
A simple contact form tied to your inbox.
Links to your main social networks.

cards.title: Design and user experience
list: Responsive design that looks great on phone, tablet and desktop.
Ordered sections that guide visitors step by step.
Visual language tailored to your brand voice.

cards.title: SEO and going live
list: Initial SEO configuration (titles, descriptions, technical basics).
Support choosing and configuring domain + hosting (provider costs separate).
Final checks before publishing.
